casebody.data:
John E. SMITH, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
SDI EXTERIOR SYSTEMS, LLC, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158152
COA: 341235 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 18, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
